document_data.name: Aura Versus Alignment
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aura versus alignment''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed a caster to protect themselves from spells by evil or good alignment creatures. It protected against mind-altering abilities or spells, and also provided some magical resistance.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
